org.gramar.extension

Class TemplatingExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gramar.extension.TemplatingExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITemplatingExtension
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClasspathTemplatingExtension, JarFileTemplatingExtension

    public abstract class TemplatingExtension
extends Object
implements ITemplatingExtension

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected String abbreviation
      The default abbreviation (namespace) to use when referencing specific custom tags and xpath functions in this platform extension

      The extension ID in the form of a java package name.
      protected ArrayList<DefinedFunction> functions
      A cache of XPath functions defined in this extension.

    • Field Detail

      • extensionId

        protected String extensionId
        The extension ID in the form of a java package name.

      • abbreviation

        protected String abbreviation
        The default abbreviation (namespace) to use when referencing specific custom tags and xpath functions in this platform extension

      • label

        protected String label

      • provider

        protected String provider

      • functions

        protected ArrayList<DefinedFunction> functions
        A cache of XPath functions defined in this extension. The functions are wrapped as a DefinedFunction which has a reference to the implementation of the function as well as metadata about the function, including arity, whether the function has a variable number of arguments and the name of the defined XPath function.

      • META_FILE_NAME

        public static final String META_FILE_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
